text: And on the Day when He shall muster them all together, He will say (to the jinn): ´O assembly of the jinn, you have seduced a good many of mankind.´ And their companions from among the humans will say: ´Our Lord! We did indeed benefit from one another and now have reached the term which You had set for us.´ Thereupon Allah will say: ´The Fire is now your abode, and therein you shall abide.´ Only those whom Allah wills shall escape the Fire. Surely your Lord is All-Wise, All-Knowing
